name: Recommendation System with Item-Item Collaborative Filtering
tagline: A recommender system prototype based on item-item collaborative filtering
body:
## Setup

The system is built with LensKit, an open-source took kit for building recommenders.

Requires the following:

[Java SE Development Kit 7](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html/)

[LensKit](http://lenskit.grouplens.org/)

[Apache Maven](https://maven.apache.org/)

Java IDE such as [Eclipse](http://www.eclipse.org/) or [IntelliJ IDEA](http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/).

## Background

This recommendation system prototype uses item-item collaborative filtering.  [Here for details.](http://files.grouplens.org/papers/www10_sarwar.pdf)

The algorithm is composed of the following steps.

1. Building a model by computing similarities between items.  We do this by:
a. Subtract the user's mean rating from each rating prior to computing similarities.
b. Calculate [cosine similarity](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cosine_similarity) between items.

2. Score the items.  By using a pre-defined number of neighbours computed in step 1, the item is scored using [weighted sum](http://files.grouplens.org/papers/www10_sarwar.pdf).

3. The item-item similarity matrix is also useful for 'find similar items' features.  Items can be scored with the sum of its similarity to each of their reference items.

## Test Drive

A set of test data is provided for movie ratings, but can be easily adopted for other domains.

data/movie-titles.csv
Maps Movie IDs to Movie Titles.

data/ratings.csv
Users and their movie ratings. Each line of the CSV file is ordered as: User ID, Movie ID, Rating

data/users.csv
Maps User ID to User Name.

Run the recommender with command similar to the following:
run-ii 1024:77 1024:268 1024:462 1024:393 1024:36955 2048:77 2048:36955 2048:788

For each pair, the first item is the User ID and the second pair is the Movie ID.

Outputs associate score for each move/user pair.  With the test dataset, the following result is obtained.
2048,788,4.1253,Mrs. Doubtfire (1993)
2048,36955,3.8545,True Lies (1994)
2048,77,4.5102,Memento (2000)
1024,462,2.9900,Erin Brockovich (2000)
1024,393,3.7702,Kill Bill: Vol. 2 (2004)
1024,36955,2.5612,True Lies (1994)
1024,77,4.1968,Memento (2000)
1024,268,2.3366,Batman (1989)

For running the 'find similar items' feature with reference item:
run-ii --basket 77

Output:
550,0.3192,Fight Club (1999)
629,0.3078,The Usual Suspects (1995)
38,0.2574,Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind (2004)
278,0.2399,The Shawshank Redemption (1994)
680,0.2394,Pulp Fiction (1994)

Can also run with multiple reference items:
run-ii --basket 77 680

Output:
550,0.6941,Fight Club (1999)
629,0.5984,The Usual Suspects (1995)
238,0.5361,The Godfather (1972)
278,0.5166,The Shawshank Redemption (1994)
274,0.4916,The Silence of the Lambs (1991)
